summary:
For those that favor the bow and want to add a little more damage to their attacks.
Adds 5 new perks to the Archery skill tree (different perks add damage bonuses versus different enemy types), as well as an optional file that adds new ranks to the Deadly Aim perk.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Main Features:[/b][/u]
[u]Adds 5 New Archery Perks[/u]
[list]
[*][color=red](Req: 40 Archery)[/color] [b]Poacher:[/b]  Bow attacks deal 25% more damage to animals. (bears, deer, trolls)
[*][color=red](Req: 60 Archery, Poacher)[/color] [b]Dangerous Game:[/b] Bow attacks deal 25% more damage to the more \'exotic\' game in Skyrim. (player races such as Nord and Khajiit, Hagravens, Giants)
[*][color=red](Req: 80 Archery, Dangerous Game)[/color] [b]Bane of Daedra:[/b] Bow attacks deal 25% more damage to Daedra. (Atronarchs, etc.)
[*][color=red](Req: 80 Archery, Dangerous Game)[/color] [b]Stalker of The Undead:[/b] Bow attacks deal 25% more damage to the Undead. (Draugr, etc.)
[*][color=red](Req: 100 Archery, Bane of Daedra OR Stalker of The Undead)[/color] [b]Dragon Slayer:[/b] Bow attacks deal 25% more damage to Dragons.
[/list]
[u]Standalone \'Mini-Perk Tree\'[/u]
[list]
[*]Perks can be attained without any prerequisites from the main Archery perk tree (i.e. Overdraw)
[*]Tried the best I could to shape the new mini-constellation in an \'arrow\' shape to match the already existing constellation graphic.
[/list] 

[b][u]Optional Features:[/b][/u]
[u]2 New \"Deadly Aim\" Ranks[/u]
[list]
[*]Require Level 60 and 80 Sneak, respectively
[*]2nd Rank raises Bow Sneak Attacks to 6 times damage
[*]3rd Rank raises Bow Sneak Attacks to 9 times damage
[*]In an \"optional\" file as 9x damage with a bow is pretty overpowered
[/list]

[b]Note From The Creator:[/b]
This mod is mainly the result of me toying around with my freshly downloaded copy of the creation kit. I\'m sort of new to modding, and will probably only delve into changing gameplay elements and stay away from textures, graphics, and modeling.
I acknowledge that this mod may not be 100% Lore Friendly.
Anyway, I\'m also of course new to balancing and such, so please comment with any suggestions on changing the damage modifiers.
Likewise, please leave feedback about any bugs, mod conflicts, or suggestions for further development or even small things such as description changes (I\'m really iffy on Dangerous Game).

[b][u]Outside Mod Suggestions:[/b][/u]
[list]
[*][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7308]Skill Interface Retexture[/url] by Tko007:[/b] The new mini-constellation blends in much better with this mod\'s texture enhancements.
[*][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10037]Improved Archery and Bows[/url] by RealJames:[/b] This mod works very well to even further enhance the use of the Archery skill.
[*][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11623]Spend Dragon Souls For Perks[/url] by DarkSeraphim85:[/b] As this mod adds 5 new perks (and 2 optional ranks) to the game, this mod is good for balancing out your perk point usage.
[/list]
